title: Omega Squad Veteran Icon Not Unlocking: REDEEMED FAILED!
body:
I have completed all the task and earned the five omega tokens but when i go to craft into omega squad veteran icon it won't let me. It says REDEEMED FAILED! You drop in a shard, expecting a magical transformation... but instead your shard pops back out. Please try restarting your client. If this you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.  Well i restarted multiple times and am still having the same issue. Is anyone else experiencing this?
{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MethTookMyTeeth,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vUKNqFOk,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-04T14:58:25.141+0000)
>
> I have completed all the task and earned the five omega tokens but when i go to craft into omega squad veteran icon it won&#039;t let me. It says REDEEMED FAILED! You drop in a shard, expecting a magical transformation... but instead your shard pops back out. Please try restarting your client. If this you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.  Well i restarted multiple times and am still having the same issue. Is anyone else experiencing this?
> {{champion:17}}

same bro

Our hextech guys are looking into this issue now.  I've got a[ sticky post ready](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Z3zIAhas-8417-hextech-crafting-failed-to-redeem) for updates, and we are investigating the failing to redeem issue!
